articles.title: ASX closes lower despite iron ore record; Afterpay considers US share listing; Amatil sale approved - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian share market ends lower despite iron ore prices reaching record highs in Australian dollar terms. Afterpay announces it is considering a US share listing, while Coca-Cola Amatil's sale gets the final go-ahead.
articles.content:
The Australian share market has finished the day lower, despite record iron ore prices, although the dollar edged higher off the back of commodity price rises.
